name: Auto Layout Quick Sample (KR)
description:
It's a simple UI template using Auto Layout. It helps you quickly check out how the main design will look like on various devices.


  1. Assets are fully editable if you'd like to, but not mandatory.
  2. Editing only one component 'template', the variations will be automatically applied onto various devices.
  3. By adjusting heights and widths, the layout will be fully responsible as well.


Please enjoy this as much as you want! Thanks.
